metadata.title: RA4T1, RA6T3: Small and low pin count package lineup

sections.content:
Question:
Looking for a small size and low pin count package products of RA-T series.
Answer:
The RA4T1 and RA6T3 support 5 mm square 32-pin QFN and 7mm square 32-pin LQFP packages.
Suitable Products
RA4T1, RA6T3
